content:
@jenlampton There was a little interest in the geofield queue so I made a PR for the issue in question. If you get a chance to review the PRs and make a new release it sounds like someone is interested in the module but not comfortable editing code to patch it themselves.
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/geofield/pulls

backdrop-contrib/geofield
Stores geographic and location data (points, lines, and polygons). - backdrop-contrib/geofield

I'd want to test but then this happens... Don't know what causes this -.-
grafik.png
Well it was my fault. Instead of downloading the code I'd save the file to my folder. Now I've started a new test and it works!
